channel.title: Making anyuser say something specific [command] [508]
channel.description:
i want to make a command like..
::say something
ok and i want to make a command like
::name someones username
and i want to type something in ::say and when i type the username i want in ::name i want that person to say (out loud) what i typed in ::Say...but im clueless here. im new at 508 and i don't know how to start.
i got a great start
[code] if (cmd[0].equals("say")) { [/code]
